bibl.title: A Metrological Survey of Ptolemaic Bronze Coins.
bibl.note: A Metrological Approach. - Precedents. - Type Definitions, Grouping and Methodological Limitations. - Data and Sources. - Data Quality and Precision. - Approximative Type Identifications. - Groups of Related Coin Types. - A. Pre-Reform Coinage. - B. Post-Reform Coinage. - Conclusion. - Pp. 87-112: Appendix 1. Metrological Tables 1-4; - 113-115: Appendix 2. Graphical and Statistical Methods. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Daniel Wolf, A Metrological Survey of Ptolemaic Bronze Coins.
